welcome.title2: â€“ your pathway to education success
welcome.description: Are you aiming to elevate your portfolio and secure a spot at your dream university? At Student.com, we offer a comprehensive suite of courses and events designed to enhance your academic profile and make your application stand out.

offers.title: What we can offer
offers.subtitle: Three main opportunities we can offer to you

offer1.title: Courses
offer1.text: Unique courses created by users for skill sharing and collaborative learning.

offer2.title: Bulletin Board
offer2.text: Discover and participate in exciting events, workshops, and activities.

offer3.title: Creative Learning
offer3.text: A non-standard approach to creating courses and mastering skills.

for_subtitle1.q1: What is the purpose of the Darwin.kz website?
for_subtitle1.a1: The Darwin.kz website is designed to provide a new approach to learning in Kazakhstan, based on the exchange of skills online. It creates a community where users can learn through courses and participate in events listed on the bulletin board.

for_subtitle2.a1: To create a course, you need to register on the site, then go to the 'Studio' section, click the 'Create Course' button, and follow the instructions.
for_subtitle2.a2: Registration on the site is not required. Go to the 'Bulletin Board' tab, select an event that suits you, review the terms, and fill out the form by following the link.
for_subtitle2.a3: Currently, there is no specific feature to track progress, but the Darwin team is working on this feature.

for_subtitle3.q1: Which courses are paid, and which are free?
for_subtitle3.a1: All courses on the site are free.

for_subtitle4.a1: The easiest way to contact technical support is to scroll down to the footer where there are links to social networks. You can also go to the 'Contacts' section and choose another suitable way to contact us.
for_subtitle4.a2: Currently, there is no mobile application, but the team is working on developing one.
for_subtitle4.q3: How to leave feedback about a course?
for_subtitle4.a3: Currently, there is no option to leave feedback as this is the test version of the project. However, this feature will be added in the future.

course.title: Course Creation and Learning
course.description: Darwin allows you to create courses with custom lessons and content. They can be studied online or used offline on large screens in educational institutions.

b_board.title: Announcement Board
b_board.description: Darwin provides a platform for posting information about extracurricular activities and important events to engage participants and maintain communication.

effort.first_part: Put your efforts into creating a new community

feedback_form.title: Join our team
feedback_form.subtitle: Fill out the form and take the first step towards joining our team
